item.title: 给tempdb加2个文件做缓存
item.description: sql脚本如下： USE [master]; GO alter database tempdb modify file (name='tempdev', size = 8GB); GO /* Adding three additional files */ USE [master]; GO ALTER DATABASE [tempdb] ADD FILE (NAME = N'tempdev2', FILENAME = N'E:\SQLDATA\tempdev2.ndf' , SIZE = 8GB , FILEGROWTH = 0); GO
